title: Apollo Commercial Real Estate Finance, Inc. Reports First Quarter 2022 Results - The Bakersfield Californian
content: Apollo Commercial Real Estate Finance, Inc. Reports First Quarter 2022 Results  The Bakersfield Californian
description: NEW YORK, April 25, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo Commercial Real Estate Finance, Inc. (the “Company” or “ARI”) (NYSE:ARI), today reported results for the quarter ended March 31, 2022.
